txt.en: Complete a snowball fight! \n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>
Cecil Voller awaits you at the edge of the battle-field.\n\nYou should speak with Cecil Voller of your success in the snowball battle.
'Well done, [placeholder]! You have quite a knack for this sport. I'll wager there are a lot of cold people around here now, thanks to you.'

'Hello there, good patron! While you can complete the Snowball-fight as many times per day as you like, I'll only reward you for it once!  \n\n'Complete either the easy or the more difficult snowball challenge and then return to me for your reward.'
